author: jkosin
msg: OPENNLP-50: added more markers for sectons needed for building source

author: ate
msg: Remove documentation of the no longer supported convenience configuration option of not having to specify the unpack artifact if only one dependency is defined for the plugin.
Maven 3 turns out to have a API backwards compatibility breakage  which makes this no longer possible to determine  :(

author: jkosin
msg: changed the news to use the smaller heading style just added.

author: jkosin
msg: css style change added a 4th heading type (or third in our case for 14pt bold

author: ate
msg: Fix jetspeed mvn unpack plugin (and related) to fail because Maven3 has a API behavior breakage on PluginDescriptor.getIntroducedDependencyArtifacts() which now always returns an EMPTY_COLLECTION ... :(
